.clearfix:before,
.clearfix:after {
  display: table;
  clear: both;
  content: "";
}

.stock-container {
  max-width: 300px;
  margin: -10px 0 20px 0;
}
.stock-container form {
  padding: 5px 7px 0px;
}
.stock-container form input[type=text] {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 5px;
  width: 100%;
  outline: none;
}
.stock-container ul.tabs {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  list-style: none;
}
.stock-container ul.tabs li {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  background: none;
  width: calc(50% / 3);
  color: #9b9b9b;
  float: left;
  padding: 0 5px 1px;
  line-height: 30px;
  cursor: pointer;
  text-align: center;
  font-weight: 700;
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(163, 83, 145, 0.25);
}
.stock-container ul.tabs li:last-child {
  width: 50%;
  border-right: none;
}
.stock-container ul.tabs li:last-child.current {
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(163, 83, 145, 0.25);
  padding-bottom: 1px;
}
.stock-container ul.tabs li.tab-search-select input {
  width: 100%;
  border: 1px solid rgba(151, 151, 151, 0.25);
  padding: 5px 20px 5px 5px;
  background-image: url("/wp-content/plugins/ventra-stock/img/search@2x.png");
  background-size: 10px 10px;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: right 5px center;
}
.stock-container ul.tabs li.current {
  padding-bottom: 0;
  border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  color: black;
}
.stock-container .tab-content {
  display: none;
  background: white;
  padding: 7px;
}
.stock-container .tab-content.current {
  display: inherit;
}
.stock-container .tab-link {
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-size: 12px;
}
.stock-container .stock-section {
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  list-style: none;
}
.stock-container .stock-section.stock-item {
  padding: 10px;
  border: 1px solid rgba(155, 155, 155, 0.25);
  border-top: 3px solid green;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
}
.stock-container table {
  background-color: white;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  width: 100%;
}
.stock-container table td {
  height: 38px;
  font-weight: 700;
  padding: 10px 0 5px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  text-align: right;
  color: #4a4a4a;
  font-size: 10.5pt;
}
.stock-container table td small {
  font-size: 7.5pt;
  font-weight: 300;
  display: block;
  text-transform: capitalize;
  color: #4a4a4a;
  margin: 3px 0 2px;
  height: 1.4em;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.stock-container table td.name {
  padding-left: 10px;
  padding-right: 10px;
}
.stock-container table td.perc {
  width: 80px;
  font-size: 22.5pt;
  font-size: 12pt;
  padding-right: 10px;
}
.stock-container table td.indicator {
  width: 40px;
  line-height: 38px;
  margin: 0 5px 8px;
  text-align: right;
  position: relative;
  top: -2px;
}
.stock-container table td.stock-value {
  width: 60px;
  padding-right: 10px;
  text-align: right;
  font-size: 9pt;
  font-size: 12pt;
}
.stock-container table td:first-of-type {
  text-align: left;
}
.stock-container table tr {
  border: 1px solid rgba(155, 155, 155, 0.25);
  border-top: 4px solid black;
}
.stock-container table tr.single-loser {
  border-top-color: #FF433D;
}
.stock-container table tr.single-gainer {
  border-top-color: #1CCC92;
}
.stock-container table tr:last-of-type {
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(155, 155, 155, 0.5);
}
.stock-container table tr.gap {
  border: none !important;
}
.stock-container table tr.gap td {
  height: 5px;
  font-size: 1px;
  padding: 0;
}
.stock-container table tr.no-entry {
  background: #f5f5f5;
  border-color: #f5f5f5 !important;
}
.stock-container table tr.no-matches {
  border-color: rgba(155, 155, 155, 0.5) !important;
  border-top-color: #9b9b9b !important;
}
.stock-container table tr.no-matches td {
  padding-left: 10px;
}
.stock-container table tr.no-matches td .no-match-box {
  position: relative;
  top: -3px;
  left: 3px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: flex-start;
}
.stock-container table tr.no-matches td img {
  margin-right: 10px;
}

.stock-scroller {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: black;
  color: white;
  display: block;
  height: 1.6em;
  white-space: nowrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding: 10px;
}
.stock-scroller ul {
  padding: 10px;
  list-style-type: none;
  margin: 0;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;
  left: 0;
}
.stock-scroller li {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 12pt;
  font-weight: 600;
}
.stock-scroller li img {
  border: 2px solid transparent;
  margin-left: 20px;
}
.stock-scroller li span {
  margin-left: 10px;
}

.admin-bar .stock-scroller {
  top: 32px;
}
